note: Miniclip's titles are almost universally Free-to-Play, rely heavily on in-app purchases and advertisements, and feature simulated gambling mechanics (betting in-game currency on match outcomes) that often lead to higher age classifications in some jurisdictions.

gamekit_integration.leaderboards: Yes (Integrated with Apple Game Center for leaderboards and achievements)
gamekit_integration.achievements: Yes (Integrated with Apple Game Center Achievements)

content_description.other_content_warnings: Frequent/Intense Simulated Gambling (Players bet virtual currency to enter matches and win their opponent's stake. Some in-game 'Mini Games' like Spin/Scratch also mimic casino games.)

gamekit_integration.leaderboards: Yes (The core gameplay revolves around a real-time leaderboard, and it integrates with Game Center)
gamekit_integration.achievements: Yes (Integrated with Apple Game Center Achievements)

content_description.violence: Infrequent/Mild Cartoon or Fantasy Violence (The core mechanic is one cell consuming a smaller cell.)
content_description.other_content_warnings: Unrestricted web-based content (User-created cell names/skins can sometimes contain inappropriate language/images, which contributes to the 9+ rating.)

gamekit_integration.achievements: Yes (Integrated with Apple Game Center Achievements)

content_description.other_content_warnings: Infrequent/Mild Simulated Gambling (Matches are played with an entry fee of in-game currency, where the winner takes the pot.)
